instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-00165: What is 820-00165? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: 00165 boots then shuts
threads.message:
I have a <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00165</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> that had liquid damage, after ultrasonic it boots then after a minute or so shuts down. <CAPACITOR>C5001</CAPACITOR> and <CAPACITOR>C5020</CAPACITOR> were messed up replaced no change.
when it shuts i can short <RESISTOR>R5115</RESISTOR> to turn it back on, tested without keyboard.

threads.title: 00165 boots then shuts
threads.message:
Try first starting in SMC bypass.
As you had corrosion near SMC, I recommend you to reball it.

threads.title: 00165 boots then shuts
threads.message: Reballed smc and tried smc bypass same thing sometimes just gets past the login screen sometimes it dosent completley load in after password

threads.title: 00165 boots then shuts
threads.message:
Did the board start with max fan speed in SMC bypass?

Test (in normal mode) booting Windows, or Linux Live USB.

threads.title: 00165 boots then shuts
threads.message: Yes max fan speed in smc bypass i tried ubuntu normally and it hasnt shut down

threads.title: 00165 boots then shuts
threads.message:
Then try to clean ME region.
If not good, try full known good BIOS, with clean ME.

threads.title: 00165 boots then shuts
threads.message: Wrote a clean ME bios file on this one and no change. Where can i learn about what would be an issue with the bios? And im using a file i believe i found on the forum that had a clean ME, are you saying that i need to clean the ME myself from a good bios because im not sure how to do that

threads.title: 00165 boots then shuts
threads.message: Remove <RESISTOR>R1921</RESISTOR> and try to boot macOS again.

threads.title: 00165 boots then shuts
threads.message: Now it shuts down as its loading os (apple logo with loading bar)

threads.title: 00165 boots then shuts
threads.message: Did you try to boot in safe mode?

threads.title: 00165 boots then shuts
threads.message: Safe mode worked. On login screen the screen flickered and made weird lines going up and down the screen it hasnt shut down so far

threads.title: 00165 boots then shuts
threads.message:
So the problem appears when macOS try to load a driver.
For this reason Windows/Linux Live work, as do not load all drivers when booting.
Do fresh install of Windows and check which driver cannot be installed; maybe Intel graphics fails.
You can also run memory test from Windows Live.

threads.title: 00165 boots then shuts
threads.message: Booted off of windows and worked installed the graphics driver *intel hd 6000* and it shut down and shuts down when using the same os with that driver installed

threads.title: 00165 boots then shuts
threads.message: So the cpu is bad? Would reballing be worth a shot

threads.title: 00165 boots then shuts
threads.message:
You can try a reflow, just for test.
I recommend to run a RAM test first, from Windows.
